name: Phoenixborn
description: The Phoenixborn embodies the essence of fire and rebirth with fiery feathers that illuminate its surroundings.
memorable: It can heal itself upon reaching 0 hit points, causing a fiery explosion that damages nearby creatures.
goals: To engage in combat while utilizing flight and fiery abilities.
relations: Might be found alongside other fire-affiliated creatures.
environment: Typically inhabits warm or volcanic regions.
strengths: Resistant to fire damage and capable of both melee and ranged attacks.
attacks: Uses a Talon attack for slashing damage and Hurl Flame for fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Rebirth allows it to erupt in flames and regain health while damaging foes when defeated.
senses: Has a passive perception score of 12, allowing it to sense its environment adequately.
skills: Average perception skills, indicating it doesn't excel in noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius with dim light for an additional 10 feet.
Can fly, making it versatile in combat.
Good Dexterity allows for effective dodging.
Lower Intelligence indicates limitations in complex reasoning.

humanoid with fiery feathers and melee attacks
phoenix-themed creature that uses fire attacks
